title: Kurt Bradley (Writer, Photographer)
description:
Kurt Bradley is a motorsports photographer and contributing writer for Jalopnik. He has driven some seriously fast stuff, and been to some amazing places. 

Check out Kurt's work here: http://kurtbradley.co/

This show is also a video, with photos to go along with the conversation: https://youtu.be/zdRkW3rFxgs

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @kurtbradley

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

 

Check out our merch!

https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
